official-title.#text: To provide for the establishment of a fund to provide for an expanded and sustained national investment in biomedical research.

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the
It is the purpose of this section to establish a Biomedical Research Fund (referred to in this section as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , to provide for an expanded and sustained national investment in biomedical research through the programs and agencies described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: America Helping Encourage Advancements in Lifesaving Science/s:2/ss:b/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to ensure that funding for such programs and agencies for such fiscal year does not fall below 105 percent of the level of funding provided for the fiscal year immediately preceding the fiscal year for which the determination is being made and an additional amount to account for any increases in the Gross Domestic Product for the year involved.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: America Helping Encourage Advancements in Lifesaving Science/s:2/ss:b/p:2

text.#text: For each fiscal year, amounts shall be transferred from the Fund to the accounts related to the programs and agencies described in
The programs and agencies described in this paragraph are the following:
